Styles

Manage and retrieve handwriting styles.

List Styles

GET /api/styles

Get all available handwriting styles.

Example Request:

GET /api/styles HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:5000
Cookie: session=...

Example Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{
    "styles": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Style 1",
            "description": "Default handwriting style",
            "preview_url": "/api/style-preview/1"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Style 2",
            "description": "Cursive style",
            "preview_url": "/api/style-preview/2"
        }
    ]
}

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK - Success

  • 401 Unauthorized - Not authenticated

Style Preview

GET /api/style-preview/(int: style_id)

Get a preview image for a specific style.

Parameters:

  • style_id - The style ID

Example Request:

GET /api/style-preview/1 HTTP/1.1
Host: localhost:5000
Cookie: session=...

Example Response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: image/svg+xml

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"...>
  <!-- Preview SVG content -->
</svg>

Status Codes:

  • 200 OK - Success

  • 404 Not Found - Style not found

  • 401 Unauthorized - Not authenticated
